metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46673 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was identified that malformed scripts used in the script processor of an Ingest Pipeline could cause an Elasticsearch node to crash when calling the Simulate Pipeline API.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
